name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ShopBuddy for Malaysia - Earn Points Shopping

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop, save and earn Points at MY.SHOP.COM partner stores with ShopBuddy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Earning SHOP Points just got easier!  Save time, money and earn SHOP Points when you shop online with ShopBuddy.  ShopBuddy for Malaysia is powered by MY.SHOP.COM. 

Get alerts for deals and discounts, whenever you are shopping online through any of our partner stores. 

Looking for products or just your daily essentials? Simply just search the item from Google, Yahoo or MSN Bing, ShopBuddy will alert you to the available SHOP Points from any of the participating partner stores.

ShopBuddy is Free!  Download ShopBuddy now and start earning SHOP Points today!   

Learn more about earning SHOP Points at your favorite merchants with SHOP.COM.
https://my.shop.com/shop-point-progarm-k.xhtml

Questions?  ShopBuddy Frequently Asked Questions
https://my.shop.com/shopbuddy/faq

By installing ShopBuddy add-on / extension, you are agreeing to SHOP.COM Terms of Use located at https://my.shop.com/info/terms-of-use, SHOP.COM Privacy Policy  located at https://my.shop.com/info/privacy-policy and End User License agreement located License in the https://img.shop.com/Image/shopbuddy/SHOPBUDDY_End_User_License_MY_English.pdf
